subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2631 has been delivered
description_text:

I just received my shipment, but the packaging does not include the haptic feedback motors....




Corné de Leeuw

conversations.body_text: Hello, this is the Haptics delivery tracking link. Your parcel should arrive within the next couple of days. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045909831687
